title="More from guardian.co.uk on Ed Miliband"> Ed Miliband said today. Speaking during a visit to Scotland shortly after Andy Coulson 's announcement, the Labour leader said the resignation raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment. He's now done the right thing, Ed Miliband said.`` I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment about hanging on to him as long as he did.'' One of Jay Cutler 's biggest concerns will be avoiding mistakes, and Packers cornerback Tramon Williams has been forcing plenty of them. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
